overview: An Independent Consultant who has worked for both the UN and Red Cross. Set up Humanitarian Emergency Planning Disaster Relief Consultancy (HEPDRC) Ltd in 2006 as an Incorporated Company, then registered as a limited Company in 2010. HEPDRC is a Consultant and Advisor on various projects, (of which one is working on at present), concerning all issues related to the DPRK. One is working on a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU), to set up a Multiparty Dialogue Mechanism on a ‘Knowledge Sharing’ Programme which is intended to open up a discussion on Economic Development Assistance to push forward to prevent armed conflict and establish a lasting Peace in the North Korean Peninsula. As well as, how to get more outside sources of infromation into the hands of North Koreans.
